ygData.subject: Intro
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, Just stumbled across you and thought I would join and give you a bit of an intro on who I am. My name is Rick and I live and work in the greater DC
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,

Just stumbled across you and thought I would join and give you a bit
of an intro on who I am.

My name is Rick and I live and work in the greater DC area.
Brief stats:
Blondish/Brown hair
Reddish goatte
blue eyes
5'9" 265#

My profile on Yahoo has a picture of me if you are really interested
in seeing: poohnva

I have been playing EQ for almost 9 months.

I am kind of dating a nice guy. Looking to meet other people in the
area with similar interests.

I saw that many of you had recently sent in a brief description of
yourselves/characters. I took the liberty to create a table on the
Egroups site so that we can keep this info in.

I have also created a file which is a Word 97 document. This file
has the current stats and average prices of about 1500 items from the
game. I have compiled this list from a few different websites and
thought it would be good to have as a resource for people. It prints
nicely and is indexed by type of item (weapon, armor etc). I will
update it about every week or so. If you want a copy of this file,
send me an email and I will send it to you.

My characters are all currently on the Innorruk server. I have a lvl
29 druid named Looseleaf Binders. I have been haunting the Lake of
Ill Omens and whooping up on the Sarnak's and goblins in the area!
I just left my guild (Mithril Knights) because I felt they were far
to clique. I want to find a guild where most people are there to
help one another. A gay or gay-friendly group would be ideal.

I typically play from 7pm to 11pm most nights and on the weekends as
much as possible. If you want to group sometime, just give me a
tell.

Later,
Rick
